thinking: At the start of the game, I need to start harvesting resources and build a barracks as soon as possible. Since I only have one worker, I will make it harvest the closest resource.

The first priority is to build a barracks so that I can start training combat units. I have enough resources to build one. I will use the worker to build the barracks near the base. I should move the worker to a location near the base that is not occupied.
The game is in the early stage. I need to focus on economy and build a barracks. I have enough resources to build a barracks. I will use the worker to build a barracks near the base.
The ally base has enough resources to build a barracks.  A barracks should be built near the base to begin producing offensive units.
Following the suggested strategy, the current priority is to build a barracks. I have enough resources to build a barracks. I will assign the worker to build a barracks at (3,2).

The ally base is at (2, 1) and has 5 resources. I need to build a barracks. I will use the base to build a worker to harvest resources and then use a worker to build a barracks. It costs 5 resources to build a barracks, so I will build one now.

Okay, it's turn 750. I need to focus on closing out the game. I will focus on destroying the enemy base since I don't have a barracks yet, since there is no way I would have 5 resources yet at turn 750. I will move the worker to attack the enemy base at (5,6).
The ally base has 5 resources. Build a barracks at (3, 2) with the worker.
The current goal is to build a barracks to start producing combat units. The ally base has enough resources, so the next step is to identify an available worker to build the barracks.
The ally base has enough resources to build a barracks. Building a barracks is the top priority to start training units. Position (3,2) is chosen as it is close to the base.

The Ally base at (2, 1) has 5 resources. It needs 5 more to build a Barracks. There are neutral resource nodes at (0, 0) and (7, 7). Since this is turn 950, I want to build a Barracks and start producing units. I will assign the Ally base to train a worker so that I can use the worker to harvest resources.
Okay, it's turn 1000 and I need to continue building up my economy and military. I have one worker and one base. I need to have the worker harvest resources until I have 5 to create a barracks.

The ally base has enough resources to train a worker. Let's train a worker to increase our resource gathering rate. The ally worker will harvest resources from the nearest resource node and bring them back to the base.

The ally base has enough resources to keep training workers and has two workers available. Focus on harvesting resources and attacking the nearest enemy workers to disrupt the enemy economy. Prioritize attacking the closest enemy workers to maximize damage output and minimize travel time. Since there is not a barracks built, focus on saving up resources and build the barracks to start producing units.

The ally base has 5 resources. I have two workers, one moving to resource, one idling. I need 5 more resources to build a barracks. I should send the idle worker to gather resources. I will tell the idle worker to harvest.

Okay, let's get a barracks built so we can start producing combat units. I need 5 resources to build a barracks. My base has 7 resources. My worker is at (1, 1). I will have my worker build a barracks near my base at (3, 2).

Okay, it's turn 1250. I need to focus on eliminating the enemy. I will command my worker to harvest resources and build a barracks. I have 7 resources. I can build the barracks immediately. The enemy has multiple workers and a base. I should build a barracks near my base and train some units to attack the enemy workers and base.
The Ally base has resources > 5, so it should build a barracks. The worker should move to harvest resources.

The ally base is low on health, but should be fine for now. I need to create another worker to help harvest and build a barracks. The workers should harvest from the closest resource node and the base should train a worker.

The top priority is to build a barracks so I can train more units. I have enough resources to build one, so I will assign my available worker to build a barracks near my base. Then, I will assign the other worker to harvest resources.

The game is in a late stage (turn 1450). The ally has 7 resources and one worker actively producing a unit, and their base has 9 HP. The enemy base has 10 HP and several workers still alive. Need to eliminate the enemy workers to cripple their economy while protecting the base and building barracks to produce units. Prioritize building a barracks since workers are automatically gathering resources.

The current turn is 1600. I have one worker and one base. I should keep the worker harvesting to gather resources. I need 5 resources to build a barracks, and I currently have 6, so I should build a barracks.
My ally base is damaged. I should repair it. I should also train more workers to gather resources.
The most important thing right now is to start training units and prepare for an attack. I have enough resources to train a unit. Train a heavy unit for now.
